meanings.definition: Constructed with a raised road or path.
meanings.sent1: The causewayed bridge allowed travelers to cross the river safely.
meanings.sent2: The causewayed path through the marshland made the journey much easier.
meanings.sent3: The causewayed walkway was so high that the ducks had to waddle underneath.
meanings.sent4: The causewayed trail seemed to float above the water like a magic carpet.
meanings.sent5: The causewayed road stood out like a ribbon of safety in the wilderness.

meanings.definition: Provided with a raised road or path.
meanings.sent1: The causewayed village was well-connected to neighboring towns.
meanings.sent2: The causewayed area was perfect for cycling without any bumps.
meanings.sent3: The causewayed playground had ramps for the children to race down.
meanings.sent4: The causewayed neighborhood felt like a separate world above the rest.
meanings.sent5: The causewayed street gleamed in the sunlight, inviting all to walk on it.
